name: ocr_extract_text
description: Extract text from an image or PDF using NDL-OCR Lite. Supports Japanese text including vertical writing. Returns per-line text with bounding boxes and confidence scores.

image.description: Base64-encoded image/PDF data or S3 URI (s3://bucket/key). Supports JPG, PNG, TIFF, JP2, BMP, and PDF.

pages.description: Page range for PDFs (e.g. '1-3', '1,3,5'). Default: all pages. Ignored for images.
